result.execSummary:
The defendant Jacob J. Scheffel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jacob J. Scheffel is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jacob J. Scheffel was found guilty of Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (2nd w/ Pass), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant, Jacob J. Scheffel appeared with Attorney James C. McLaughlin.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State.  Court calls case and appearances.  Also has 14 CF 128 and 15 CF 31.  
Court speaks to the parties.  State speaks to the court re: sentencing.  It is a joint recomendation.  Atty McLaughlin speaks to the court.  

14 CF 106 - Count 4--10 days county jail credit 2 days. $1,820.00  DL Rev 12 months. AODA Assessment.  60 DTP  Must report on or before September 14th by 3pm.  

14 CF 128-- 3 years probation-AODA Assessment. Any and all other conditions the DOC imposes. Absolute sobriety. Not to consume or possess any controlled substances unless prescribed by a liscensed doctor. Behavioral study. 
Concurrent w/
15 CF 31  -- 3 years probation-AODA Assessment Any and all other conditions the DOC imposes. Absolute sobriety. Not to consume or possess any controlled substances unless prescribed by a liscensed doctor. Behavioral study.

Defendant, Jacob J. Scheffel appeared with Attorney James C. McLaughlin.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State.  14 TR 1011, 14 CF 106, 14 CF 128 and 15 TR 148.  Atty McL waived reading in 15 CF 31 - waived time limits for preliminary exam.  Atty McL makes stmt requests status/plea be set.  Status hrg or plea scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 10:45 am.
1:22 PM court called case and appearances defendant had a warrant arrest.  Also has 14 CF 106.  Court further addressed him.  Warrant quashed.
Motion hearing on February 18, 2015 at 08:05 am.

Defendant, Jacob J. Scheffel appeared with Attorney James C. McLaughlin.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State.  Court calls case and appearances.  Status--also has 14CF106.  Preliminary hearing and Motion Hearing scheduled for 2/18/15 @ 8:05 am.
Telephone scheduling conference on October 31, 2014 at 11:00 am.

McL will file substitution sometime next week.   Court - bail cont.   Substitution to be filed on TR case as well.   Adj'd 10:56 am.
